bibl.title: Samson Eitrem (1872-1966).

series.title: Biblioteca degli "Studi di Egittologia e di Papirologia".

bibl.note: Partly identical with: Samson Eitrem - On the Threshold of Antiquity, The World of Ancient Magic. Papers from the First International Samson Eitrem Seminar at the Norwegian Institute at Athens, 4-8 May 1997 = Papers from the Norwegian Institute at Athens. 4 (Bergen, 1999) pp. 12-19, 1 portrait.

bibl.title: Hermae. Scholars and Scholarship in Papyrology

bibl.seg: Mario CAPASSO (Ed.), Hermae. Scholars and Scholarship in Papyrology = Biblioteca degli "Studi di Egittologia e di Papirologia". 4 (Pisa, 2007) pp. 187-191, fig. XIII.

Partly identical with: Samson Eitrem - On the Threshold of Antiquity, The World of Ancient Magic. Papers from the First International Samson Eitrem Seminar at the Norwegian Institute at Athens, 4-8 May 1997 = Papers from the Norwegian Institute at Athens. 4 (Bergen, 1999) pp. 12-19, 1 portrait.
